description: Structured information describing a research product.

description._instruction: Enter a description (abstract) for this research product (max. 200 words; no references).

digitalIdentifier._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of this research product.

fullName._instruction: Enter a descriptive full name (title) for this research product.

homepage._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) to the homepage of this research product.

shortName._instruction: Enter a short name (alias) for this research product (max. 30 characters, no space).
